00047 namespace Ogre {
00048     class EAGLSupport;
00049     class EAGLESContext;
00050 
00051     class _OgrePrivate EAGLWindow : public RenderWindow
00052     {
00053         protected:

00055             bool mVisible;
00057             bool mIsExternal;

00061             bool mUsingExternalViewController;

00074 #endif
00075 
00076             void switchFullScreen(bool fullscreen) { }

00078             void initNativeCreatedWindow(const NameValuePairList *miscParams);

00080             void reposition(int left, int top);
00081             void resize(unsigned int width, unsigned int height);
00082             void windowMovedOrResized();

00084

00089             void create(const String& name, unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00090                         bool fullScreen, const NameValuePairList *miscParams);
00091 
00092             virtual void setFullscreen(bool fullscreen, uint width, uint height);
00093             void destroy(void);
00094             bool isClosed(void) const { return mClosed; }
00095             bool isVisible(void) const { return mVisible; }
00096 
00097             void setVisible(bool visible) { mVisible = visible; }
00098             void setClosed(bool closed) { mClosed = closed; }
00099             void swapBuffers(bool waitForVSync);
00100             void copyContentsToMemory(const PixelBox &dst, FrameBuffer buffer);
00101 
00111             virtual void getCustomAttribute(const String& name, void* pData);
00112 
00113             bool requiresTextureFlipping() const { return false; }
